attributes.name: standalone
attributes.description:
Flag to render stand-alone full-size white keys, located at the end of the keyboard.
Or, in rare cases, at the start of it (like on Yamaha P-121, Casio WK-6600 or Nord Stage 3 Compact).

properties.name: standalone
properties.description:
Flag to render stand-alone full-size white keys, located at the end of the keyboard.

attributes.name: start
attributes.description:
Starting note of octave (provided as key index).
Indices are starting at 0 (note C).
To start octave at Gb, start = 6.

attributes.name: length
attributes.description: Number of keys in the octave (12 by default).
